document_data.name: Protection From Illusions
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from illusions''''' was a [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a caster to see past an illusion or phantasm. The illusion or phantasm became transparent, allowing the caster to see what was being hidden or the true form of a creature.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
